argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dihsmatrn.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | dihsmatrn.i | |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | dihsmatrn.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 4 |  | dihsmatrn.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) |
| 5 |  | dihsmatrn.a | |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) |
| 6 |  | dihsmatrn.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 7 |  | dihsmatrn.x | |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) |
| 8 |  | dihsmatrn.q | |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 9, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_dihjat2 | |- ( ph -> ( X ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) Q ) = ( X .(+) Q ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ph -> ( X .(+) Q ) = ( X ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) Q ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` U ) = ( Base ` U ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` U ) = ( LSubSp ` U ) |
| 14 | 1, 3, 2, 13 | #P_dihrnlss | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. ran I ) -> X e. ( LSubSp ` U ) ) |
| 15 | 6, 7, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> X e. ( LSubSp ` U ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 3, 6 | #P_dvhlmod | |- ( ph -> U e. LMod ) |
| 17 | 13, 5, 16, 8 | #P_lsatlssel | |- ( ph -> Q e. ( LSubSp ` U ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 3, 12, 13, 4, 2, 9, 6, 15, 17 | #P_djhlsmcl | |- ( ph -> ( ( X .(+) Q ) e. ran I <-> ( X .(+) Q ) = ( X ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) Q ) ) ) |
| 19 | 11, 18 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> ( X .(+) Q ) e. ran I ) |
